title: Indian Classical: Pandit Jasraj - Vocal (8 Albums)
description:
Indian Classical: Pandit Jasraj - Vocal (8 Albums)

Pandit Jasraj (January 28, 1930) is a famous Indian Classical vocalist, and the foremost exponent of the Mewati Gharana in Hindustani classical music.

Panditji&#039;s greatest contribution to Indian classical music is his conception of a unique and novel jugalbandhi, styled on the ancient system of moorchanas, between a male and a female vocalist, each singing in their respective scales and different ragas at the same time. [Wikipedia]

[Note: Some of the albums and bhajans have already been uploaded earlier (on Demonoid) by my dear friend Ryabov. This effort is just to make all these albums available in a single torrent. So choose and download, if you wish]
